book0.title: City of the Gods
book0.author: Sonny Whitelaw
book0.description: Notes about Argos, the planet originally under the control of the Goa'uld Pelops. A definitive Greek ancestry decorates the structures, as well as the clothing of the Argosians, the planets occupants who prefered to call themselves the Chosen. For some time Pelops operated on the planet, experimenting on the human population, much like Nirrti has done, attempting to expand their lifespan.

book1.title: The Power Behind The Throne
book1.author: Steven Savile
book1.description: P3X-797 is a world divided into a dark and light side. The Stargate resides on the dark side of the planet where the 'Touched' exist. The light side is inhabited by the 'Untouched'. A histaminalytic virus inhabits the world, forcing anyone with histamine in their bodies to succumb to primeval tendencies. The leader of the light side is Tuplo.

book2.title: Sacrifice Moon
book2.author: Julie Fortune
book2.description: Explores the treacherous planet of P5C-353, a barren and hostile world that harbors a deadly secret. The Stargate team must uncover the mystery of the planet's past to ensure the safety of its future.

book3.title: Barque of Heaven
book3.author: Suzanne Wood
book3.description: The planet P3X-562 is home to an ancient ship known as the Barque of Heaven, a vessel of great power and mystery. The SG-1 team must navigate the political intrigue and dangers posed by those who seek to control the Barque.

book4.title: Valhalla
book4.author: Tim Waggoner
book4.description: Set on the icy planet of P3X-593, known to its inhabitants as Valhalla. The SG-1 team discovers a civilization modeled after Norse mythology and must contend with a powerful being who believes himself to be the god Odin.

book5.title: Heart's Desire
book5.author: Amy Griswold
book5.description: On the lush planet of P4X-347, the SG-1 team encounters a society that thrives on the manipulation of emotions. They must navigate a complex web of relationships and desires to achieve their mission and return home.

book6.title: Female of the Species
book6.author: Geonn Cannon
book6.description: Exploring the matriarchal society on the planet P2X-131, the SG-1 team must adapt to a world where women hold all the power and men are subservient. Their mission is complicated by cultural misunderstandings and hidden threats.
